user.name: Stian Soiland-Reyes
user.description: I am one of the myGrid developers working in University of Manchester, mainly working on Taverna, but also involved in myExperiment development. Most of the workflows I will publish here on myExperiment are either test workflows (that highlight bugs in Taverna!), technique workflows (like how to do iteration or XML parsing) or other people's workflows that again break Taverna in one way or another. ORCID: http://orcid.org/0000-0001-9842-9718
